query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_firmware_packages (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  device_type ENUM('plc','sensor','gateway','hmi','scada','other') NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  model VARCHAR(100),
  file_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  file_size INT NOT NULL,
  checksum VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  checksum_type ENUM('md5','sha1','sha256') DEFAULT 'sha256',
  release_notes TEXT,
  min_required_version VARCHAR(50),
  is_stable INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  is_beta INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  download_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('draft','published','deprecated','archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  published_by INT,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_device_type (device_type),
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_version (version),
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_status (status)
);

  release_notes TEXT,

  is_stable INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  is_beta INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  download_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('draft','published','deprecated','archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  published_at TIMESTAMP NULL,

  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_device_type (device_type),
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_version (version),
  INDEX idx_firmware_pkg_status (status)
